Package br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form

Class BaseActionForm<M extends BaseModel>

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.BaseActionForm<M>
Type Parameters:
M - Class that defines the form data model.

All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoginSessionActionForm, MainConsoleActionForm
public abstract class BaseActionForm<M extends BaseModel> extends Object implements Serializable
Class that defines the basic implementation of a form.
Since:
1.0.0
